originalText.text: I recently just purchased family plan for $70, unlimited text or phone call and data service. Guess what the data speed is only 1.1 Mbps. I couldn't go to Youtube. PLEASE REMEMBER - 7 DAYS FREE CANCELATION FOR YOUR 1ST MONTH PAYMENT.

originalText.text:
I don't recommend Hello Wireless because I was charged twice for the service, and when I disputed the charges with my credit card, he claimed to have done two different things on my phone. A very skilled person with cellphones, no doubt, but also dishonest.

Thank you for your reply. I never asked for the battery to be replaced, and my phone still now has the original battery. Not surprised you will still claim you did two things to my phone given the honesty you have shown. I would not have paid $200 to keep an old phone going. Would have bought a new one. I wish I had.

originalText.text: Amazing customer service, highly recommend going there for repairs.

originalText.text: Oh my gosh I wish I could give zero star to hello mobile network it’s  a big disappointment and big no to the new buyers please do not buy we bought this network a month ago as we were looking for Gud network and hello mobile was promising to provide 5G speed but sorry to say this network don’t even go for 3g / it shows 3g and 2G service calls never get connected many made complaint that my cell number does  not  work . It’s a total scam it does full fill any of their statements everything is a lie so don’t fall for it as we did I m already changing my network to other network providers .

originalText.text: Walked in with complex issue on both my Iphones (that even the Apple Store couldn't figure out)  and were blown away by the savy, professional and objective way the store owner solved the issue. Highly recommend this local store if you ever have any technical difficulties with your phone. Thank you!
